title: BBC Our World 2015 South Sudan Shattered Dream 720p x264 AAC HDT
description:
South Sudan: Shattered Dream

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Yalda Hakim, published by BBC broadcasted as part of BBC Our World series in 2015 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/0/02/South-Sudan-Shattered-Dream-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Just four years after South Sudan was granted independence, becoming the world's newest country, it has descended into chaos and conflict. The fighting, mostly along ethnic lines, has created one of the world's largest humanitarian crises. Thousands have been killed, more than two million people displaced, and parts of the country are on the brink of famine. Our World's Yalda Hakim travels deep into rural South Sudan. She meets traumatised people, some on the verge of starvation, living off little more than leaves and grass.
